CustomField.description: Renders the Case Flag Age as "xx Days xx Hours xx Minutes".
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(FLAGS__Case_Flag_Time_Days__c), null, FLAGS__Case_Flag_Time_Days__c + ' ') + IF(ISNULL(FLAGS__Case_Flag_Time_Hours__c), null, FLAGS__Case_Flag_Time_Hours__c + ' ') + IF(ISNULL(FLAGS__Case_Flag_Time_Mins__c), null, FLAGS__Case_Flag_Time_Mins__c)
CustomField.label: Case Flag Time
